Create bloodline
Creates a bloodline using the defined parameters.
Change bloodline picture
Opens the menu for changing bloodline pictures.
Cultural category
Opens the menu containing 'Cultural' pictures.
Building category
Opens the menu containing 'Building' pictures.
Religion category
Opens the menu containing 'Religion' pictures.
Animal category
Opens the menu containing 'Animal' pictures.
Character category
Opens the menu containing 'Character' pictures.
Other category
Opens the menu containing 'other' pictures.
Change inheritance style
Opens the menu for changing inheritance styles.
Enable/disable matrilineal override
Opens the menu for enabling/disabling matrilineal override.
Allow/disallow bastards
Opens the menu for allowing/disallowing bastards.
Change bloodline name
Opens the menu for changing the bloodline name.
Change bloodline effects
Opens the menu for changing the bloodline's effects.
